title: RunFlowResponse
description: Defines the output produced by FlowRunner after running a flow; JSON schema representation of the RunFlowResponse.java class

jobId.description: Unique identifier for this job. If not user-specified, should be a UUID

flowName.description: The name of the flow, now the flow object

user.description: Name of the MarkLogic user that ran this job

jobStatus.description: The status is 'started' when the Job document is first created, and it is then modified to one of the other values as steps are completed

startTime.description: dateTime at which the job started

endTime.description: dateTime at which the job ended

stepResponses.description: For each step that was executed, a key with a name equaling the step number of the step will be present

targetEntityType.description: Will be populated if the step defines a targetEntityType

targetDatabase.description: The database that the step writes to

fullOutput.description: A map of URI to documents; populated via the undocumented 'fullOutput' step option

status.description: Not an enum, as its values refer to step numbers

totalEvents.description: An 'event' is an item (usually a URI) that is processed by a step
